name: Heart2Heart
description:
This is a 2-player platform storyg ame where you have to work together to complete a heart in order to go on to the next level. In each level, there are different emotions that have to be communicated in order to move to the heart in the middle, where it will get filled up once both players are on it.

Play online!

https://nitroguy10.github.io/Chillennium2023Build

Walk through:

CONTROLS:

For player one you can use WASD to move.

For player two you can use the arrow keys to move.

Other controls are included in the gameplay.
